The Dylan Thomas Trail goes through the countryside and along the coastline of west Wales from Llanon through to Lampeter and Aberaeron, ending in Newquay. The Trail runs through places of significance during the poet's lifetime.
The key sites which were of importance in the life of Dylan Thomas include: Llanon, Tal-sarn, Gelli, Aberaeron, Ciliau Aeron, Llanerchaeron, Llanina, Goosegog lane, Majoda and Traethgwyn beach.
